SEARCH
Package menu

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
menu.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Menu class stores the available MenuItems in the Branch.

  • Constructor Details

    • Menu

      public Menu(Branch branch)
      Constructs a Menu.
      Parameters:
      branch - Branch in which the Menu will be initialised.

  • Method Details

    • getBranch

      public Branch getBranch()
      Gets the Branch of this Menu.
      Returns:
      The Branch of this menu.

    • getMenuItems

      public ArrayList<MenuItem> getMenuItems()
      Gets the MenuItems in this Menu.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of the MenuItems in this Menu.

    • displayItems

      public void displayItems()
      Prints the existing MenuItems in this Menu in a tabled manner.

    • itemsExist

      public boolean itemsExist()
      Verifies if MenuItems exist in this Menu. If not, prints an error message for the customer to view.
      Returns:
      true if items exist, false if not.

    • itemExistsByName

      public boolean itemExistsByName(String name)
      Verifies if the MenuItem exists in this Menu.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the MenuItem to check for.
      Returns:
      true if it exists, false if not.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(MenuItem menuItem, int numExistingItems, boolean stored)
      Adds a new MenuItem to this Menu, then updates the Excel sheet after verifying it is not a duplicate item.
      Parameters:
      menuItem - The MenuItem to be added into this Menu.
      numExistingItems - The number of existing items to add the MenuItem in the Excel sheet at the index after.
      stored - The boolean value to check if the MenuItem is a duplicate item. True if it is a duplicate, false if not.

    • updateItem

      public void updateItem(MenuItem itemToUpdate)
      Verifies if a MenuItem exists, then updates its details in the Excel sheet.
      Parameters:
      itemToUpdate - The MenuItem to be updated.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(MenuItem itemToRemove)
      Verifies if a MenuItem exists, then removes it from the Excel sheet.
      Parameters:
      itemToRemove - The MenuItem to be removed.
